This, like 42719, is a duplicate of 34246 and a bug in the Eclipse Ant support,
which has JDT classes in the parent class loader.  The workaround is to fork
iajc (specify forkclasspath) as described in but 34246. 

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 34246 ***
